9.ara-name: كتاب الحج عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ibn Abbas narrated:"Whoever performed Tawaf around the House fifty time, he will be as free of his sins as the day his mother bore him

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي فَضْلِ الطَّوَافِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Virtues Of Tawaf
